summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $695.99 from the General Fund for the purpose of paying excess of advertising in eastern financial publications $955,000 Refunding bonds, $50,000 General Municipal Bonds, $1,000,000 Park bonds and $500,000 Water Extension bonds, and for the further purpose of reimbursing Bruce C. Shorts, Assistant Corporation Counsel for sums expended by him for telegrams passing between Hubbard & Masslich, Attorneys for buyers of $955,000 Refunding bonds and himself, and for sums expended by him in the preparation of transcripts of record covering the $50,000 General Municipal bonds and $500,000 Water Extension bonds; and authorizing the drawing of warrants therefor.
